General.Name: Chia Hsin Cement Corp
General.Description: Chia Hsin Cement Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of cement in Taiwan and internationally. The company's activities include the wholesale and retail sale of building materials; non-metallic mining; manufacturing of mixed concrete; international trade; leasing, construction, and development of residences and buildings, and industrial factory buildings; real estate commerce; real estate rental and leasing; reconstruction within the renewal area; and warehousing and storage. Chia Hsin Cement Corporation was incorporated in 1954 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.96, Zhongshan North Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 104
